channel.title: Animal Police Foundation on Animal Police Organization
channel.description: Recent content in Animal Police Foundation on Animal Police Organization

item.title: About
item.description: People for Animals 2013 Foundation Our foundation is an organization of citizen volunteers that was founded in 2013. Our founding members have several years of animal rescue experience. For us, animal rescue is a vocation, and we do it voluntarily in our spare time. Our foundation aims to help animals’ well-being and quality of life and to immediately rescue animals that have fallen victim to animal cruelty by cooperating with the authorities.

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
